Acolite

Acolite processor for atmospheric correction

processors.acolite.acolite.process(env, params, l1product_path, _, out_path)

This processor calls acolite for the source product and writes the result to disk. It returns the location of the output product.

processors.acolite.acolite.rewrite_settings_file(settings_file, sensor, resolution, limit, l2w_mask_wave, l2w_mask_threshold, l2w_mask_smooth, l2w_mask_cirrus_threshold, l2w_mask_negative_rhow, luts_reduce_dimensions, dsf_aot_estimate, l2w_parameters)
